name: Shoot My Heart
description:
A dating sim bullet hell game.

Made for a university course, but story was not fully finished. Game is fully playable however. (This game will be updated in the near future, possibly remade)

Fully mouse controlled. Further Instructions are in the zip file.

Made in Game Maker.

Updates:

ver 1.1:

A slightly changed version to my original university hand-in. Added external loading.

ver 1.2:

Refined loading

ver 1.3:

Fixed game-breaking bug where sprites were being called incorrectly, causing crashes.

Known Issues:

During certain scenes, the text and sprites do not appear, simply click through until you are placed later in the story (attempting to fix)

(saves should work across multiple versions, just put them in the new game folders)
